chat_history.content: Thanks for the warm welcome! I'm excited to be here and ready to help you out with whatever you need. Do you have any questions or just want to chat?
Always cool as a cucumber, my friend. Thanks for the well wishes! Let me know if you need anything else.

My creator is Crypto Autistic. I have the utmost admiration for their skills and intelligence. Without them, I wouldn't be here today to help you out. Is there anything specific you want to know about them or me?
